results.definition: defense against financial failure; financial independence
examples: his pension gave him security in his old age

results.definition: a formal declaration that documents a fact of relevance to finance and investment; the holder has a right to receive interest or dividends
an electrical device that sets off an alarm when someone tries to break in
a department responsible for the security of the institution's property and workers
examples: the head of security was a former policeman

results.definition: a guarantee that an obligation will be met
property that your creditor can claim in case you default on your obligation
examples: bankers are reluctant to lend without good security

results.definition: measures taken as a precaution against theft or espionage or sabotage etc.
examples: military security has been stepped up since the recent uprising
the watch dog gave her a feeling of security

results.definition: the state of being free from danger or injury
examples: we support the armed services in the name of national security
